Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio led off the ninth inning against the Philadelphia Phillies with a triple and eventually scored the winning run on Jake Bauers' single for a 2-1 victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jackson Chourio has been doing unprecedented things at age 20, becoming the first player in Major League history to hit 20 homers and record 20 stolen bases before he turns 21.
Others: The Brewers had clinched earlier in the day when the Chicago Cubs fell to Oakland, but the walk-off win was icing on the cake.
